title: Victory Garden
description: It's 1917, and while Rose Scofield does her part to make woman suffrage a reality, she falls in love with Adam Bell, a vaudeville actor who travels the country with his brothers gathering laughs and hard knocks. When Rose is arrested for her suffragist activities, sheâ€™s kept in solitary confinement and violently force fed. After her release she must come to terms with her dreams for the future.
author: Meredith Allard
